channel.title: Car discussion
channel.description:
Any car from Euro, Japan, or America. Discuss your favorites, parts, problems, or anything else you can think of.
I have a 2003 Mistubishi Eclipse Spyder. Drivers window won't roll down. :( Probably going to get it fixed soon though.
I want a Mistubishi EVO X or IX, shit is so badass.

item.title: Car discussion
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:9, topic:407697”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=508975.msg3693817#msg3693817 date=1312308065]
I am actually making a deal with my parents for a 97 Cavalier. Partially because i have a spoiler and drift style body kit picked out. Got a paor of z3 fenders laying in the shed for it. You should look into some. Its relatively cheap to buy the stuff. I’m amazed how nice these cars can look.
[/quote]
Ooh. This is relative to my interests. How much would I be looking at?[/quote]
The body kit i found was around $400, i never looked at shipping although it shouldnt be much over $100 or so. The spoiler I am looking at is $39 with $25 shipping. The z3 fenders i got back when I was 16 but you should be able to get a pair cheap.

Keep in mind, most, if not all parts will come white unless bought used. I suggest saving up the cash for a paint job and settibg that aside before you go buying the parts.

I am looking at engine parts from a site, but I am second guessing it as i passed a group of these idiots racing down the highway while i was on my crotchrocket.

Site:
http://www.horsepowerfreaks.com

Read full topic

item.title: Car discussion
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:7, topic:407697”]I would love to have a 1971 Plymouth hemi cuda, preferably black. My current car at the moment is a '96 chevy cavalier. This is basically what it looks like. Same color and such.
http://media.ed.edmunds-media.com/pictures/VEHICLE/1996/Chevrolet/13190/1996.chevrolet.cavalier.1909-300x189.jpg[/quote]
I am actually making a deal with my parents for a 97 Cavalier. Partially because i have a spoiler and drift style body kit picked out. Got a paor of z3 fenders laying in the shed for it. You should look into some. Its relatively cheap to buy the stuff. I’m amazed how nice these cars can look.

item.title: Car discussion
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

My current list:
[ul][li]'02 Ford Explorer Sport Trac[/li]
[li]'93 Mercury Topax[/li]
[li]'95 Suzuki GSXF600 with a 750 motor.[/li]
[li]'04 Honda Shadow VLX600 Deluxe[/li]
[li]'05 125cc Japanese scooter (using it to teach my gf how to ride a 2 wheeled vehicle, since its been crashed, dumped, etc. Its more of a crash car)[/li][/ul]

I have 2 dream cars (almost had my hands on the first one last week):
[ul][li]'68-'70 Dodge Charger[/li]
[li]'68-'73 Dodge Superbee[/li][/ul]

[quote=“m.dog311, post:5, topic:407697”]`69 Charger R/T is by far my favorite car. However, I’m looking at getting a Jeep Wrangler Rubicon edition some time in the next few months
(Ye, I’m a Chrysler fanboy)

Btw, there’s a board for this over at mitb :P[/quote]
There is a topic, but the are fast to insert racial stereotypes and such where it doesn’t fit.

Read full topic
